dublinCore.dc:title: 118 HR 264 IH: Faithful Execution of the Law Act of 2023
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Joyce of Ohio (for himself, Mr. Amodei, Mr. LaTurner, Mr. Stewart, Mr. Latta, Ms. Tenney, and Mr. Austin Scott of Georgia) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on the Judiciary

form.official-title: To amend section 530D of title 28, United States Code.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Faithful Execution of the Law Act of 2023.

section.header: Amendment to section 530D of title 28, United States Code
section.text: Section 530D(a)(1)(A) of title 28, United States Code, is amendedâ€”

paragraph.text: by inserting or any other Federal officer before establishes or implements a formal or informal policy; and
in clause (i), by striking on the grounds that such provision is unconstitutional and inserting and state the grounds for such policy.
